title: Girl of the Golden West
creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, William Anthony McGuire and Robert Z Leonard
brief_description: Cowpokes from all around agree. Ain’t nobody like Mary, the tomboy they call “the girl.” She is equally at ease serving a slug of whisky as she is trilling a tune and when it comes to playing a hand of cards to save the neck of the man she loves, she does as any cowboy would, she cheats. Saddling up for this song-filled sagebrusher are Jeanette MacDonald as Mary, and Nelson Eddy as Ramerez, the gold-hearted desperado whom she loves. However, Sheriff Rance (Walter Pidgeon) turns the twosome into a triangle. He’s got an eye for Mary and nothing would please him more than to hold a hanging for Ramerez! Sit back, grab a cuppa and get ready to enjoy a rip-snorting good time!
